  • public class NReadInputFormat
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.input.NLineInputFormat
    NReadInputFormat This is a custom InputFormat class for Multiple readlines per mapper.

        Creates a NReadRecordReader to read each file assigned to this InputSplit.
        Overrides:
        createRecordReader in class org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.input.NLineInputFormat
        Parameters:
        split - The InputSplit to read. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if this is not a FileSplit.
        context - The context for this task.
        Returns:
